title: Google\Cloud\Firestore\V1\Target
name: Target
description:
A specification of a set of documents to listen to.

Generated from protobuf message google.firestore.v1.Target

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.documents
params.description: A target specified by a set of document names.

params.name: data.resume_token
params.description: A resume token from a prior [TargetChange][google.firestore.v1.TargetChange] for an identical target. Using a resume token with a different target is unsupported and may fail.

params.name: data.read_time
params.description: Start listening after a specific read_time. The client must know the state of matching documents at this time.

params.name: data.target_id
params.description: The target ID that identifies the target on the stream. Must be a positive number and non-zero.

params.name: data.once
params.description: If the target should be removed once it is current and consistent.
